tool_description: Compares cancellation policies across different booking platforms and hotels, scoring policy flexibility and identifying the most favorable terms.

policy_data.description: JSON strings containing cancellation policy information

check_in_date.description: Planned check-in date for policy evaluation

error_messages: Invalid policy data: Policy information must contain cancellation terms and deadlines.
Invalid check-in date: Check-in date must be in the future and properly formatted.
Policy parsing error: Unable to interpret cancellation terms from one or more sources.
usage: Provide policy_data containing cancellation policy information and check_in_date for timeline calculations. Returns policy comparison and flexibility scores.

flexibility_scores.description: Flexibility scores for each policy (0-100, higher is more flexible)

free_cancellation_deadline.description: Free cancellation deadlines for each option

penalty_amounts.description: Cancellation penalty amounts after free period

most_flexible_option.description: Platform/option with the most flexible cancellation terms

policy_summary.description: Summary comparison of all cancellation policies
